org.simplity.tp

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.tp.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddColumn, AddMessage, AddRow, BatchProcessor, Block, ComplexLogic, CopyRows, CopyUserId, CreateSheet, DbAction, DropIntoMessageBox, Encryption, ExternalService, JmsProducer, JumpTo, LdapAuthenticate, LdapLookup, Log, Logic, PickupFromMessageBox, RemoveValue, RenameSheet, RestClient, RowExists, SendMail, SetValue, SubService, Synchronizer

    public abstract class Action
extends Object
    An action inside a service
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String actionName
      unique name within a service
      protected String executeIfNoRowsInSheet
      execute if there is no sheet, or sheet has no rows
      protected String executeIfRowsInSheet
      if you want to execute this step if a sheet exists and has at least one row
      protected Expression executeOnCondition
      precondition to be met for this step to be executed.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public final Value act(ServiceContext ctx,
                       DbDriver driver)
        main method called by service.
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        driver -
        Returns:
        an indicator of what the action did. This value is saved as a field named actionNameResult that can be used by subsequent actions. null implies no such feature

      • delegate

        protected Value delegate(ServiceContext ctx,
                         DbDriver driver)
        This is the intermediate method that can be implemented by actions that actually use db driver. We provide a default delegate that does not use driver
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        driver -
        Returns:
        value from action

      • doAct

        protected Value doAct(ServiceContext ctx)
        Method to be implemented by actions that do not use a driver. We provide it as a dummy, rather than making it abstract to provide concrete actions to wither have a method with driver or without
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        Returns:

      • getDataAccessType

        public DbAccessType getDataAccessType()
        * what type of data access does this action require?
        Returns:
        data base access type required by this step.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns:
        name of this action

      • getReady

        public void getReady(int idx,
                     Service service)
        if there is anything this class wants to do after loading its attributes, but before being used, here is the method to do that.
        Parameters:
        idx - 0 based index of actions in service
        service - to which this action belongs to

      • validate

        public int validate(ValidationContext vtx,
                    Service service)
        validate this action
        Parameters:
        vtx -
        service - parent service
        Returns:
        number of errors added to the list
